rows.label: qev041901_MSG0001
rows.name:
Over-the-top wedding dresses in this shop are the best.
Nio just HAVE to get one for Popo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0002
rows.name:
And where in heck is Ntoto? Nio not have cash on
hand to buy dress. What should Nio doooo?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0003
rows.name:
Nio is merchant too, yes? Then Nio knows never
to waffle on major purchase. If Nio has found perfect
dress, stop thinking and make with buying![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0004
rows.name:
Especially for dress as popular as this one.
If friend keep hemming and hawing, Nana will sell out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0005
rows.name: Nooo! Nrrgh... There nothing else for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0006
rows.name: Er, sorry. Human friend? Nio promise this not scam.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0007
rows.name:
Nio respectable business Nopon with shop at caravan
in Cauldros. Perhaps friend knows of Nio Necessities?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0008
rows.name:
So, uh...can friend spot Nio some cash?
Nio swear to pay it all back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_JNK0010
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev041901_SEL0011
rows.name: Keep your wallet closed around the suspicious Nopon.

rows.label: qev041901_JNK0020
rows.name: Listen

rows.label: qev041901_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Nio you'll consider it depending on his story.

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0090
rows.name:
Nio admit that probably prudent.
Friend is sharper than [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] seemed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0009
rows.name: But please, at least listen to story of Nio. *ahem*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0010
rows.name:
So once upon time, which is actually very soon,
Nio will marry SUPER cute girl named Popo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0011
rows.name:
Ooh! ...R-really? Nio never expect that to work.
Friend is awfully nice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0012
rows.name:
If a total stranger ask Nio for loan, Nio would set new
land speed record running away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0013
rows.name:
But yes, please listen to story of Nio. *ahem* 
So once upon time, which is actually very soon,
Nio will marry SUPER cute girl named Popo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0014
rows.name:
Nio really want to purchase gorgeous wedding dress
sold here as gift for lovely bride.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0015
rows.name:
But Nopon named Ntoto that is bringing wedding ring
and all assets of Nio still not turned up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0016
rows.name: So please lend Nio 20,000 credits so he can buy dress![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0017
rows.name:
Popo is daughter of wealthy tycoon. If Nio not give her
nice gown, in-laws will think Nio is worthless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0018
rows.name:
Come back and talk to Nio once friend has the
money together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0019
rows.name:
No need to worry. As soon as Ntoto arrive,
Nio can pay friend back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0020
rows.name:
Friend is still having trouble finding the money?
Nio need to buy the dress before it sells out...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0021
rows.name:
*sniff* *sniff* Mmm... Sweet smell of cash...
Does friend have the 20,000 credits?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0022
rows.name:
Okay, Nio borrowing exactly 20,000 credits.
Sign on dotted line of IOU, aaaaand... Here!
Friend should hold on to this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0023
rows.name:
Contracts are absolute to Nopon. Nopon who break
contract get kicked out of caravan. Very serious.
End of life as merchant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0024
rows.name:
So rest easy! Friend just needs to wait until Ntoto
arrives with money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_JNK0030
rows.name: Trust

rows.label: qev041901_SEL0031
rows.name: Take Nio at his word.

rows.label: qev041901_JNK0040
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev041901_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Nio that a scrap of paper doesn't convince you.

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0025
rows.name:
Nio is glad friend believes. When Ntoto arrive with
cash, Nio treat friend to tasty meal as extra thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0026
rows.name:
Well, contract already signed, so friend needs to get
over it. Mutually binding agreement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0027
rows.name:
...Now then! Nio will take one extremely over-the-top
dress, please![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0028
rows.name:
How about this one? Nana let Nio have it at special
price in honor of wedding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0029
rows.name:
GACK! Th-that's way too much!
Price is off by at least two digits![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0030
rows.name:
Meh-meh! If Nopon marrying one-and-only Popo is
unable to handle price like this, then that Nopon better
call whole thing off now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0031
rows.name:
Hubbypon that petty will get dumped before
year is out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0032
rows.name:
Meh! N-Nio not petty! Nio not even LIKE pets!
J-just wait one minute... Nio can... Er, that is...
Rrrgh! Nio have no choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0033
rows.name:
Nio must go borrow money from Jalolo.
Would human friend come serve as witness?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0034
rows.name:
When Nio ask Jalolo for loan, Jalolo start shouting
about not having money to waste on insignificant worm
like Nio.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0035
rows.name:
Nio not get it. Yes, Jalolo always big jerk,
but today he seem extra prickly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0036
rows.name:
Would friend maybe go talk to Jalolo and see about
securing loan? Please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0037
rows.name: Ah! Nice money-lending friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0038
rows.name:
Kind friend came by to check up on Nio?
Well, Nio got price-gouged, but bought dress anyway![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0039
rows.name:
Nio hoped to make a surprise present of it,
but Popo found out. Now Nio feeling all blushy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0040
rows.name:
This no time for blushing!
Every last asset of Nio just got lost![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0041
rows.name:
Wh-what?! B-but Ntoto packed it all on nopopotamus
and bring it here along with ring! ...Er, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0042
rows.name:
Weeeeell, during trip Ntoto was resting nopopotamus
by lakeside and might have...dozed off.
Just for quick nap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0043
rows.name: When Ntoto wake up, nopopotamus had been killed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0044
rows.name:
Cargo must have been carted off by caro or the like.
Ntoto had tied ring to teeth of nopopotamus,
but that was also gone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0045
rows.name:
But forget that for one minute! Is it true Nio borrowed
money from crook Jalolo?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0046
rows.name: Y-yes... Also from human friend here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_JNK0050
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev041901_SEL0051
rows.name: Express concern for Nio.

rows.label: qev041901_JNK0060
rows.name: Insist

rows.label: qev041901_SEL0061
rows.name: Demand that Nio pay you immediately.

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0047
rows.name:
Meeeeh... Nio work so hard saving up money
for this day...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0048
rows.name: Friend is justified. But Nio not have money to give...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0049
rows.name:
Meeeeh heh heh heh heh! Jalolo hear everything!
Oh, this is rich![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0050
rows.name:
Take close look at loan agreement. If signee is unable
to pay in cash, every hair on head must be plucked
out and handed over immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0051
rows.name:
Wh-what?! Tuft on head is the pride of Nopon!
Only lowest of low would take that away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0052
rows.name:
Young miss talks of Nopon pride, but this one here
signed contract.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0053
rows.name:
As daughterpon of merchant, Popo understands what
that means. Breaking contract mean banishment from
caravan and banning from trade with other Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0054
rows.name:
Meh heh heh! Jalolo perfectly happy either way!
Nio can spend from now until due date deciding
how he want to settle up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0055
rows.name:
Nio sorry... S-so sorry... Nio just want so bad for
Popo to have beautiful dress.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0056
rows.name:
Silly Nopon! Popo not need fancy dress!
All Popo need to be happy is Nio.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0057
rows.name:
...But no use dwelling on that now.
Contract looked scary legitimate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0058
rows.name: If Nio unable to pay, Nio will be at mercy of Jalolo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_JNK0070
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev041901_SEL0071
rows.name: Offer to front Nio the money.

rows.label: qev041901_JNK0080
rows.name: Concede

rows.label: qev041901_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Nio there's no choice but to give up his hair.

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0059
rows.name:
Friend is generous, but contract specifically requires it
to be money of Nio.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0060
rows.name:
Jalolo lent Nio that money hoping for this outcome.
He is evil, evil Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0061
rows.name: There must be some other way. Some angle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0062
rows.name:
Human friend may not understand this,
but tuft of Nopon not something one hands over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0063
rows.name: ...Ah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0064
rows.name:
Nio! Popo struck with brilliant plan!
Nio should give tuft to Jalolo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0065
rows.name:
What kind of plan is that?!
Popo said herself that tuft is pride of Nopon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0066
rows.name:
Besides, family of Popo would never allow her to marry
bald Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0067
rows.name:
Hee hee! Which is why Nio make fake tuft to give
Jalolo instead![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0068
rows.name:
Contract clearly stated that payment had to come from
money of Nio.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0069
rows.name: But it never said hair had to be REAL HAIR of Nio![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_JNK0090
rows.name: Applaud

rows.label: qev041901_SEL0091
rows.name: Stand in awe of Popo's ingenuity.

rows.label: qev041901_JNK0100
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev041901_SEL0101
rows.name: Doubt that such a simple trick would work.

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0070
rows.name:
Watching friend struggle for solution was inspiration
for Popo. Thank you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0071
rows.name:
Jalolo is devious, but that not same as being smart.
Not like friend is smart. So in case of Jalolo,
simple trick has better chance of working.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0072
rows.name:
So! Now that plan is decided, next step is to
gather materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0073
rows.name: Would friend be willing to help?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0074
rows.name:
For ingredients, Popo will need diresheep.
Hmm...and also antorus roses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0075
rows.name: We will all protect tuft of Nio together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0076
rows.name: Popo so amazing... Nio hardly deserve her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0077
rows.name:
But Nio dead-set on marrying Popo!
So please help Nio find materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0078
rows.name:
Meh-meh! Jalolo came by again to gloat.
That guy makes stomach of poor Nio ache.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0079
rows.name:
Has friend found materials for fake tuft?
Nio really need those before loan comes due...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0081
rows.name: Uncanny! This feel exactly like hair of Nio![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0082
rows.name: ...And Popo can make hairpiece out of this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0083
rows.name:
Popo will have tuft wig ready in no time.
Nio can wear it, and we will go see Jalolo together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0084
rows.name:
All right! Would [ST:playername ] come too?
Nio want friend to be there for this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_JNK0110
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev041901_SEL0111
rows.name: Say you wouldn't miss it for the world.

rows.label: qev041901_JNK0120
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev041901_SEL0121
rows.name: Tell them they're on their own from here.

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0085
rows.name:
Friend and Popo are both too kind. With help of you
two, Nio feel able to handle anything that comes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0086
rows.name:
Please? Who knows what will happen if Jalolo notices
trick? Nio would feel much better if friend were there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0087
rows.name:
Popo want friend to come as well. And friend will be
paid for time and trouble, of course![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0088
rows.name: That sparkly blue ring was super rare.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0089
rows.name:
Not sure if Nio can find same one again,
but Nio work hard to earn lots and lots of money
and buy Popo ring she deserve![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041901_JNK0130
rows.name: Give

rows.label: qev041901_SEL0131
rows.name: Hand over 20,000 credits.

rows.label: qev041901_JNK0140
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev041901_SEL0141
rows.name: Decide this is a really bad idea and walk away.

rows.label: qev041901_MSG0091
rows.name:
Augh! Please stop teasing Nio and lend money before
dress sells out! [ST:wait ]
